data.title: cocos2d-x getNumberOfRunningActions does not decrement when pause() is used ?
data.body:
I think there is a problem here. If getNumberOfRunningActions does not decrement when we use pause(), the method name should be getNumberOfActions(). I'm a bit afraid if it will change later, that it will decrement the number of running actions when pause() is used.. 

It's misleading I think...

data.title: updating AudioEngine implementation for linux
data.body: updating AudioEngine linux implementation with latests changes in AudioEngine interface (a new callback was added) and implementing pending stopAll methods. also, refactor internal data structure to support requirement of same sound being played many times simultaneously

2. Reorder the event handling in ui::TextField.

data.title: V3.7.1: Window 10 UWP project fixes
data.body: This pull request updates the Win10 UWP projects to correctly build with the final release version of Visual Studio 2015. Changes were made to the Windows 10 UWP cpp template files so it can pass the Windows App Certification tests. This pull request depends on https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-bin/pull/174.

data.title: v3.7 win32 Node::visit() causes crash if called before Scene is rendered for the first time
VertexAttribValue::setPointer for Lua
data.body:
`version:` v3.8
`issue:`
For C++, `VertexAttribValue::setPointer` just to make a shallow copy, but we can manage the memory manual. But for Lua, `glNode:getGLProgramState():setVertexAttribPointer` call `lua_cocos2dx_GLProgramState_setVertexAttribPointer` and new memory and delete memory inside. which cause the pointer becomes a null pointer while `glNode:getGLProgramState():apply(transform)`.
`reproduce:`
Lua-tests->OpenGLTest->most of tests display abnormal because of the VAO message missing.
